ygData.subject: Re: Not really Bard specific
ygData.msgSnippet: ... this is something i have been wondering about, and i know we went over this, but this statement brings it back to my attention. i hit for over 4* dmg with
ygData.messageBody:
> Ignoring for the moment that max damage is
> (2*dam+1), if two weapons have identical damage/delay ratios,
> it does not matter which one you put in your off hand, faster
> or slower.


this is something i have been wondering about, and i know we went over this,
but this statement brings it back to my attention.

i hit for over 4* dmg with my demon claw and staff of writhing (for 23 dmg
with claw, 36 with staff). my question is why, and this is just out of
curiousity. is it STR (i heard that 100+ str gives you a bonus, but dont
know if that was for rogue only, who told me this), my level (i also heard
level 20+ gives you dmg bonus, but does it keep going up or just once you
hit 20), or weapon skill (having 1h slashing or 1h blunt maxxed at 200
skill)? sorry to start this topic over again.

i just got my crystalline blade yesterday but haven't used it yet, very
interested to see if i can hit for 45+ dmg, woohoo!

Shada Silverleaf, Level 44 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
